long_description: This classic pocket knife, with tools for just about any camping situation, measures just over 3.5 inches, allowing it to slide easily into a pocket. Features two blades, a can opener with screwdriver, bottle opener with screwdriver and wire stripper, reamer with sewing eye. Corkscrew, wood saw, toothpick and tweezers. Rugged Swiss stainless-steel components, sturdy nylon handles and aluminum interior housings ensure this knife will last for years. Knife can be hung around your neck or attached to your key chain as well as carried in a pocket. Crafted by Victorinox of Switzerland.
